name: Gnome Country For Old Men
description:
The cranky old wizard next door has had it with all these Gnomes! Get yourself and your gnome brethren back home before he zaps you all! Can you save them all?

When you come to a cliff that's too high to climb or a gap that's too long to jump, try stacking!

FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED

Made for GMTK

CONTROLS:

A/D - Move

W - Jump

S - Revive Dead Gnomes

Space - Build Stack or Bridge

K - Kill Gnome
